title: Unable to connect to riot servers
body: My internet is working just fine, but i kept disconecting from the game. I eventually exited to game to try to reconect but it sais i'm unable to reconect to chat and to the game. Can someone help me? [](http://imgur.com/gOzEZGw)

replies.body:
EDIT: Looks like there was a secondary outage as well affecting Spain & Portugal.  We made some additional network pathing changes ~10 minutes ago which should fix the login issues for those players.

Hey guys,

This looks to be the result of a maintenance on the part of a backbone provider which would primarily be affecting players in France and Spain. We've made some changes on our end to help mitigate the effects of the maintenance, but there could still be some ripple effects from other carriers being affected by the maintenance.

From what we can see so far, our changes seem to have resolved the disconnections for the most part, but if anyone is still experiencing consistent disconnections, let me know!
What about Portugal tho? : (
Looks like there was a secondary outage as well.  We made changes ~10 minutes ago which should fix things, so let me know if you still can't log in.
I lost 20 LP for nothing, why dont we get a LOSS PREVENTED

>
> Looks like there was a secondary outage as well.  We made changes ~10 minutes ago which should fix things, so let me know if you still can't log in.

Yeah, where is our loss prevented...

Unfortunately we don't have a way to retroactively enable loss prevention.  For context, this type of service issue can be particularly tricky for things like loss prevention since it is only affecting certain players in certain regions.  Since our game servers don't restrict by country and only by server, it means we don't really have a way to target only the affected players in these circumstances.

Instead, we try to do preventative routing changes to minimize the impact.  Unfortunately in this case, that didn't happen soon enough and we're going to be having additional conversations internally to figure out why it didn't so that it doesn't happen again.
